answer: Yes, you can get your son's vaccinations at the public health office. It's a good idea to call them as soon as possible to set up an appointment so that he gets them on time. They will want you to bring his Health Passport/record to the appointment with you. You can find your local health unit phone number here.
question: Can I get my son's 4 momth vaccinations at the public health office if the first set were done at my doctors office?
